message: I’m tired of waiting for a response about my auto insurance refund. This has been going on for over a month!
Well, I can’t speed things up if there’s a backlog. What exactly do you want me to do about it now?
Excuse me? I expect you to do your job and provide some answers. This is unacceptable.
Alright, let me pull up your account, but I can’t promise anything will change. Can you confirm your name, policy number, and date of birth?
Fine. My name is John Smith, policy number 654321, and my date of birth is May 10, 1980. But you should already have this information.
Well, I don’t memorize customer details. Give me a moment to check.
Looks like your refund is still in process. There’s nothing more I can do until the finance team clears it. You’ll just have to wait.
This is ridiculous. I’ve been more than patient, and now you’re telling me to wait even longer? I want to make a complaint about this entire process.
Sure, you can file a complaint. But like I said, it won’t change the processing time. Is there anything else?
No, I’m done wasting my time with this company. Expect to hear from me again soon, but not in a good way.
